mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(fg.lot_id, w.lot_id) AS lotId, -- FG LOT 있으면 FG LOT 표시 o.work_order_status AS worOrderStatus, w.work_order_id AS workOrderId, p.product_name AS productName, pl.product_id AS productId FROM work_result w LEFT JOIN work_order o ON o.work_order_id = w.work_order_id LEFT JOIN product_plan pl ON pl.plan_id = o.plan_id LEFT JOIN product p ON p.product_id = pl.product_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT lot_id, type, work_order_id FROM lot_master ) fg ON fg.work_order_id = w.work_order_id and fg.type = 'FG' WHERE w.lot_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY w.work_order_id ASC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{size} ROWS ONLY
